sn55.22:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
sn55.22:1.3: Atha kho mahanamo sakko yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho mahanamo sakko bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn55.22:1.4: “idam, bhante, kapilavatthu iddhanceva phitanca bahujannam akinnamanussam sambadhabyuham.
sn55.22:1.5: So khvaham, bhante, bhagavantam va payirupasitva manobhavaniye va bhikkhu sayanhasamayam kapilavatthum pavisanto;
sn55.22:1.11: Tassa mayham, bhante, tasmim samaye mussateva bhagavantam arabbha sati, mussati dhammam arabbha sati, mussati sangham arabbha sati.
sn55.22:1.13: ‘imamhi caham samaye kalam kareyyam, ka mayham gati, ko abhisamparayo’”ti?
sn55.22:2.2: Apapakam te maranam bhavissati apapika kalankiriya.
sn55.22:2.3: Catuhi kho, mahanama, dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo.
sn55.22:2.5: Idha, mahanama, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.22:2.6: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.22:2.9: ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.22:3.1: Seyyathapi, mahanama, rukkho pacinaninno pacinapono pacinapabbharo, so mulacchinno katamena papateyya”ti?
sn55.22:3.2: “Yena, bhante, ninno yena pono yena pabbharo”ti.
sn55.22:3.3: “Evameva kho, mahanama, imehi catuhi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo”ti.
